article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 55 killed in Gaza in past day.
sentence: Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  55  killed  in  Gaza  in  past  day.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 55 killed in Gaza in past day.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  55  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  in  the  last  24  hours,  and  329  others  have  been  injured.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says 55 killed in Gaza in past day.
sentence: In  the  ministry's  latest  update,  it  says  at  least  42,344  Palestinians  have  been  killed  as  a  result  of  Israeli  military  action  in  Gaza  since  the  7  October  Hamas-led  attack  on  Israel,  with  99,013  wounded.
